data.title: AutoPolygon's copy contructor
Add physics component
data.body: Now physics integration added too much code in `Node` and other engine codes. We should move physics related codes into a component.

check .material in CCPU

data.title: Correct use and convert unicode from utf8. WinRT
data.body:
Move StringUtf8ToWideChar and StringWideCharToUtf8 to CCWinRTUtils(
Replace CCUtf8ToUnicode)
Use StringUtf8ToWideChar for convert utf8 to unicode
Use StringWideCharToUtf8 for convert unicode to utf8
CCUtf8ToUnicode and CCUnicodeToUtf8 deprecated

data.title: Android Studio: couldn't find "libcocos2dcpp.so"
data.body:
I tried:
1. Open existing project in Android Studio project > Choose `proj.android-studio` directory (In another attempt, I also tried to choose the base directory MyGame)
2. Run
3. Error: `couldn't find "libcocos2dcpp.so"`.

System:
- Mac OSX Yosemite 10.10.4
- Android Studio 1.3.1
- cocos2d-x-3.7.1

data.title: Xcode 7 beta 5: override function not marked override
data.body:
While building, many functions have this problem:

`override function not marked override`

data.title: iconv depend not resovled
data.body: iconv is used in CCFontFreeType, but the lib couldn't found in external reposity.

data.title: Gyroscope
data.body:
I enabled gyroscope and magnetic field sensor on android by forking the existing accelerometer sensor. 

There is no test as I did not find any unit test for accelerometer. 

Some devices may no have magnetic field sensor at all. I have handled this error in this pull request.

data.title: LuaJIT 2.0.4 lua iOS 64 load error
data.body:
android iphone4s is ok

iphone 5s,iphone 6 use lua code:
[LUA ERROR] load "/private/var/mobile/Containers/Bundle/Application/C2FD6099-14B6-4DF4-84BC-4F80139CE6E8/thunderGirl-mobile.app/src/main.lua", error: syntax error during pre-compilation.

data.title: Macro hides Scene::addChild
Xcode 7 beta 3 when compiling new project for iOS 7.3 on iphone 4 error: -fembed-bitcode is not supported on versions of iOS prior to 6.0
data.body:
when creating new project with cocos console , loading it to xcode 7 beat 3 for iOS 7.3 on iphone 4  and trying to compile it im getting the link error:

```
clang: error: -fembed-bitcode is not supported on versions of iOS prior to 6.0
```

**Solution is :**
in xcode go to Build Options -> Enable Bitcode = No

data.title: ProgressTimer setPercentage时描绘错误
data.body: 在创建一个ProgressTimer之后 类型为 RADIAL   setPercentage(100.f) 再setReverseDirection(true); 然后每隔一秒更新一次ProgressTimer的percentage，总共更新30次，在前4秒中描绘会出问题，但是如果将setReverseDirection(true); 放到setPercentage(100.f)之前  描绘时不会出错

data.title: V3: Window 10 UWP project fixes
data.body: This pull request updates the Win10 UWP projects to correctly build with the final release version of Visual Studio 2015. Changes were made to the Windows 10 UWP cpp template files so it can pass the Windows App Certification (WACK) tests. The Windows 8.1 cpp templates were also updated to pass the latest WACK tests.

data.title: Can't add 3D Sprite on tmx file background using Cocos-2dx
Cc.sys.localStorage App crash Cocos2d-js 3.6 in iOS 7.1.1 version
data.body:
When we use Cc.sys.localStorage method in a game, App getting crash when game is running on device iOS 7.1.1 version. We have used Cocos2d-js 3.6. 

Error: 
TypeError: 'undefined' is not a function (evaluating 'cc.sys.localStorage.setItem(JSON.stringify("isAppLauchFirstTime"), JSON.stringify(value1))')
